    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera​(Vec3 lookfrom,
              Vec3 lookat,
              Vec3 vup,
              double vfov,
              double aspect_ratio,
              double aperture,
              double focus_dist,
              int autofocus)
        Parameters:
        lookfrom - Point from where the camera will look from
        lookat - Point where the camera will be aiming
        vup - Vertical vector to identify the vertical position of the camera
        vfov - Field of view (equivalent to camera lense mm)
        aspect_ratio - Aspect ratio of image
        aperture -
        focus_dist - Focus distance
        autofocus - Flag to activate or deactivate the camera

    • Method Detail

      • get_ray

        public Ray get_ray​(double s,
                   double t)
        Produce a ray based in the parameters given
        Parameters:
        s - Also called u / parameter to identify the x position in the viewport
        t - Also called v / parameter to identify the y position in the viewport
        Returns:
        a new ray that goes from the origing of the camera to the direction created based in s & t

      • generateCamera

        public static Camera generateCamera​(double aspect_ratio,
                                    int cameraID)
        Deprecated.
        Create a camera with different settings, old method used to create cameras
        Parameters:
        aspect_ratio - aspect ratio for the image
        cameraID - ID to identify the camera presettings
        Returns:
        a Camera object
